name: WINGMAN - Responsive WooCommerce Theme
intro: Thank you for your purchasing this template. If you have any questions that are beyond the scope of this help file, please feel free to email us via our user page contact form.

sections.title: Installation
sections.content:
Theme Installation via WordPress

Step 1 – Download the theme package(All files and documentation) from Themeforest and extract it.

Step 2 – Login to your WordPress admin panel

Step 3 – Go to Appearances > Themes

Step 4 – Click on Upload Theme

Step 5 – Upload the theme file named wingman.zip. The Theme package that you downloaded from themeforest is the Master file that will include Theme File, Child Theme file and Documentation. You have to extract this and upload the just the file in it named wingman.zip.

Step 6 – Install and Activate the theme

Step 7 - After activating the theme a notice should appear on the top of the screen, click on begin installing plugins.

Step 8 - Select all the plugin,change Bulk Actions drop to Install then click apply ( see screenshots below ).

Step 9 - Congratulation you are ready to use Wingman, check the First Steps part of our documentation to see what you may want to do before starting to edit your WordPress Site.

 

Installing the theme via FTP

Step 1 – Log into your Hosting server using FTP service like Filezilla

Step 2 – In the Theme’s buyers package, unzip the file called wingman.zip

Step 3 – Upload only the Extracted folder ‘wingman’  to the folder wp-content/themes/

Step 4 – To activate the theme, navigate to Appearances > Themes in your wordpress Dashboard

Step 5 – Click on ‘Activate’ button under the theme name

Step 6 - After activating the theme a notice should appear on the top of the screen, click on begin installing plugins.

Step 7 - Select all the plugin,change Bulk Actions drop to Install then click apply ( see screenshots below ).

Step 8 - Congratulation you are ready to use Wingman, check the First Steps part of our documentation to see what you may want to do before starting to edit your WordPress Site.

sections.title: Importing Demo Content
sections.content:
The importer should be run only once. If something went wrong and you need to import the content again, you may need to reset your WordPress.

Use this plugin to reset the WordPress database : http://wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-database-reset/

 

One Click Importer

Step 1 - Log into your WordPress Dasrdoard.

Step 2 - Go to Theme Options > Demo Content.

Step 3 - Then Click on Import Demo.

Step 4 - The Dummy content is really big and may takes more then 10 minutes to import depending where you are living, Do not interrupt/cancel the import process!

Step 6 - Done!.

 

WordPress Importer

Step 1 - Log into your WordPress Dasrdoard.

Step 2 - Go to Tools > Import. Then click on WordPress ( bottom of the list ).

Step 3 - A window should appear click the Install now button which is on bottom right.

Step 4 - Click Activate plugin & Run Importer. Then choose the dummy-data/demo/content.xml file and click upload file and import Do not interrupt/cancel the import process!

Step 6 - Done!.

sections.title: Sources and Credits
sections.content:
Scripts

  • Bootstrap framework 3.0 http://getbootstrap.com/
  • Revolution Slider http://codecanyon.net/item/slider-revolution-responsive-jquery-plugin/2580848
  • Owl Carousel http://owlgraphic.com/owlcarousel
  • Gmap3 - http://gmap3.net/
  • WOW https://github.com/matthieua/WOW
  • Isotope Jquery plugin  (properly licensed) http://isotope.metafizzy.co
  • Magnific Popup http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/
  • Superfish http://users.tpg.com.au/j_birch/plugins/superfish/
  • jQuery Cookie Plugin https://github.com/carhartl/jquery-cookie

CSS

  • Font Awesome http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/
  • Bootstrap framework 3.1.1 http://getbootstrap.com/
  • Animate CSS http://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
  • Bootstrap-3-Grid-Columns https://github.com/sixfootsixdesigns/Bootstrap-3-Grid-Columns-Clearing

Images

Any Images or logos used in previews are not included in this item or final purchase and you need to contact authors to get permission in case you want to use them in your commercial or non-commercial projects.

We used http://placehold.it/ for placeholders.
